Name: Porn Empire [Ready for Remake]
Description: Run your own porn company in LifePlay.PornEmpire is a LifePlay mod that lets you run your own porn business in LifePlay. Its a management sim, so expect it to be challenging.Manage models, create videos to sell them online, organize cam shows and castings.The mod has many custom 3D scenes, NPC creator with body morphs and 30 model presets.
Msg: Thanks for installing PornEmpire! If you find any bugs, please report on Discord. Thanks. - NickNo

Name: NPC Manager [Ready for Remake]
Description: Manage NPCs, Relatives, Relationships etc. Use with care!Manage NPC-NPC or NPC-Player relationshipsThis little tool can help you to- Set relationships between NPCs, relatives and/or the player (MC)- Find 'lost' NPCs and add them to your contacts- Delete all NPCs not in your contacts (To increase game performance)- Delete ALL NPCs (even your contacts)- Delete ALL Relatives

Name: Home Extensions
Description: Add more rooms and life to your home.This adds six 3D rooms to any Home - it also adds new scenes/locations for the bathroom.Tow additional bedrooms can be let to other contacts / random NPCs.The two optional bedrooms can be rent to NPCs.If you do so, you will have some more life in your home and... maybe some interesting encounters :)

Name: Gangs of LifePlay: Kingpin [Ready for Remake]
Description: You are the boss. The crime boss!This WIP mod adds turn based combat to LifePlay.The battle system is already working and you have different weapons to choose from.You can break into storage rooms of hospitals, pharmacies etc and sell drugs and items to make money.The mod extends the crime options that the base game has. If offers turn based combat for (currently one) opponent(s) and will allow gang and prostitution management.

Name: Home Extensions [Remake Only]
Description: Add more rooms and life to your home.This adds six 3D rooms to any Home - it also adds new scenes/locations for the bathroom.Two additional bedrooms can be let to other contacts / random NPCs.The two optional bedrooms can be rent to NPCs.If you do so, you will have some more life in your home and... maybe some interesting encounters :)Mod only compatible with the Remake!

Name: Mysterious Modder's Additional Modules [Remake Only]
Description: My additional hardcore Modules. If you know me, you know what it's all about!Let the application do the job for you..These mods are ONLY COMPATIBLE WITH THE REMAKEThese mods add more scenes and actions.Use LewdPatcher for LifePlay vanilla version.

Name: The LifePlay Remake [Overhaul]
Description: Total remake of the LifePlay content, containing more completed/fixed scenes, less popup scenes, menu user with fewer elements (group actions/scenes into a single element)- Almost all files inside vin_ folders have been edited.- Contain 75% more content and 40% more items.- Universities have a purpose.- More items to buy/eat/sale or trade, most of them have a purpose.- New stats (hunger, urge to pee, sexual,...).- More actions, choices, consequence and possibilities- More activities and jobs.- You can buy an alarm system and/or train your dog to protect you.- And a lot more...- Updated almost every week.
Msg: Thanks for installing the Remake!If you find any bugs, please report on forums Raider Knight or my Discord.Thanks. - Raddeck
